tag_list: online-travel, ux, expedia, nokia, mobile, app-development, e-commerce, product-management
overview:
Bob Rogers is the Co-Founder & COO of DealAngel, a highly visual travel deal search engine currently in private beta.

Bob has been exploring the intersection of IT & travel for over 10 years, and has been involved in the travel industry in some way for over 15. His areas of knowledge span revenue management, product management, as well as business development in both the internet and mobile spaces. Bob has a BA in Economics from UBC, and a Masters in Hotel Management from Cornell University.
